Package com.github.m5rian.jdaCommandHandler

Class EventWaiter

java.lang.Object
com.github.m5rian.jdaCommandHandler.EventWaiter
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener
public class EventWaiter
extends java.lang.Object
implements net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener
Author:
Marian

With this class you're able to wait for a specific GenericEvent. Once this event is fired a callback will run too. Important settings can be made in the EventWaiter.Settings class. The EventWaiter class is only for adding new event waiters.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EventWaiter.Settings<T>
    With this class you can set up specific settings for the waiter.

    • onEvent

      public void onEvent​(@NotNull @NotNull net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.GenericEvent action)
      Fires on every discord event. This method checks if any waiter needs to be fired.
      Specified by:
      onEvent in interface net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener
      Parameters:
      action - The event, which got fired.

    • waitForEvent

      public <T extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.events.GenericEvent> EventWaiter.Settings<T> waitForEvent​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Create a new waiting event. All important settings will be made in the EventWaiter.Settings class.
      Type Parameters:
      T - T
      Parameters:
      type - The Class of the event to wait for.
      Returns:
      Returns EventWaiter.Settings to change settings on the waiters behavior.
